%% defn ty_trm
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXallXXintro}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \lambda  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_all\_intro}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXallXXelim}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x} \, \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_all\_elim}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXnewXXintro}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \nu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_new\_intro}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXnewXXelim}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_new\_elim}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXlet}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_let}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXrecXXintro}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_rec\_intro}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXrecXXelim}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_rec\_elim}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXandXXintro}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_and\_intro}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXsub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_sub}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntyXXtrm}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXallXXintro{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXallXXelim{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXnewXXintro{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXnewXXelim{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXlet{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXrecXXintro{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXrecXXelim{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXandXXintro{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXsub{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn ty_def
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdefXXtrm}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_def\_trm}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdefXXtyp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_def\_typ}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntyXXdef}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{d}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXdefXXtrm{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXdefXXtyp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn ty_defs
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdefsXXone}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{d}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{d}  \wedge  \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_defs\_one}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdefsXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{d}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{d}  \wedge  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_defs\_cons}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntyXXdefs}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXdefsXXone{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXdefsXXcons{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXtrans}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_trans}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_and11}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_and12}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXandTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_and2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXfld}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_fld}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXtyp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_typ}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXselOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_sel1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXselTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_sel2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_all}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsubtyp}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXbot{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXrefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXtrans{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXandTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXfld{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXtyp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXselOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXselTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXall{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTyping}{
\ottdefntyXXtrm{}\ottdefntyXXdef{}\ottdefntyXXdefs{}\ottdefnsubtyp{}}

% defns Inert
%% defn record_type
\newcommand{\ottdrulertXXoneXXtrm}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{record} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rt\_one\_trm}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulertXXoneXXtyp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{record} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rt\_one\_typ}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulertXXandXXtrm}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{record} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{a}  \notin \, \ottkw{labels} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottkw{record} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rt\_and\_trm}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulertXXandXXtyp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{record} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{A}  \notin \, \ottkw{labels} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottkw{record} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{rt\_and\_typ}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnrecordXXtype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottkw{record} \, \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulertXXoneXXtrm{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulertXXoneXXtyp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulertXXandXXtrm{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulertXXandXXtyp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn inert_typ
\newcommand{\ottdruleinertXXtypXXall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{inert} \, \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{inert\_typ\_all}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleinertXXtypXXbnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{record} \, \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\ottkw{inert} \, \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{inert\_typ\_bnd}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefninertXXtyp}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottkw{inert} \, \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleinertXXtypXXall{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleinertXXtypXXbnd{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn inert_ctx
\newcommand{\ottdruleinertXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{inert} \, \emptyset}{%
{\ottdrulename{inert\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleinertXXall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{inert} \, \Gamma}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{inert} \, \ottnt{T}}%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \notin  \Gamma}%
}{
\ottkw{inert} \, \ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{inert\_all}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefninertXXctx}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottkw{inert} \, \Gamma$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleinertXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleinertXXall{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsInert}{
\ottdefnrecordXXtype{}\ottdefninertXXtyp{}\ottdefninertXXctx{}}

% defns PreciseTyping
%% defn ty_val_p
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXallXXintroXXp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \lambda  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_all\_intro\_p}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXnewXXintroXXp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \nu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_new\_intro\_p}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntyXXvalXXp}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXallXXintroXXp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXnewXXintroXXp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn precise_flow
\newcommand{\ottdrulepfXXbind}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \gg  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pf\_bind}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulepfXXopen}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pf\_open}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulepfXXandOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pf\_and1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulepfXXandTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pf\_and2}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnpreciseXXflow}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulepfXXbind{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulepfXXopen{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulepfXXandOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulepfXXandTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsPreciseTyping}{
\ottdefntyXXvalXXp{}\ottdefnpreciseXXflow{}}

% defns TightTyping
%% defn ty_trm_t
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXvarXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_var\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXallXXintroXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \lambda  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_all\_intro\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXallXXelimXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x} \, \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_all\_elim\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXnewXXintroXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \nu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{defs}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_new\_intro\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXnewXXelimXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_new\_elim\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXletXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_let\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXrecXXintroXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_rec\_intro\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXrecXXelimXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_rec\_elim\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXandXXintroXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_and\_intro\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXsubXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_sub\_t}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntyXXtrmXXt}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXvarXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXallXXintroXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXallXXelimXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXnewXXintroXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXnewXXelimXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXletXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXrecXXintroXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXrecXXelimXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXandXXintroXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXsubXXt{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn subtyp_t
\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXtopXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{<:}  \top}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_top\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXbotXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \bot  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_bot\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXreflXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_refl\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXtransXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_trans\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneOneXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_and11\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneTwoXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_and12\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXandTwoXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_and2\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXfldXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_fld\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXtypXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_typ\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXselOneXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_sel1\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXselTwoXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_sel2\_t}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubtypXXallXXt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{subtyp\_all\_t}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsubtypXXt}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXtopXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXbotXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXreflXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXtransXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneOneXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXandOneTwoXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXandTwoXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXfldXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXtypXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXselOneXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXselTwoXXt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubtypXXallXXt{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTightTyping}{
\ottdefntyXXtrmXXt{}\ottdefnsubtypXXt{}}

% defns InvertibleTyping
%% defn ty_var_inv
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXpreciseXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \gg  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_precise\_inv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdecXXtrmXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_dec\_trm\_inv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdecXXtypXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_dec\_typ\_inv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXbndXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \mu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_bnd\_inv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXallXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_all\_inv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXandXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_and\_inv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXselXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \gg  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_sel\_inv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXtopXXinv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \top}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_top\_inv}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntyXXvarXXinv}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXpreciseXXinv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXdecXXtrmXXinv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXdecXXtypXXinv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXbndXXinv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXallXXinv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXandXXinv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXselXXinv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXtopXXinv{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn ty_val_inv
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXpreciseXXinvXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_precise\_inv\_v}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXallXXinvXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_\#}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_all\_inv\_v}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXandXXinvXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_and\_inv\_v}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXselXXinvXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_!}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \gg  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{A}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_sel\_inv\_v}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXtopXXinvXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \top}{%
{\ottdrulename{ty\_top\_inv\_v}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntyXXvalXXinv}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  {\vdash_{\#\#} }  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXpreciseXXinvXXv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXallXXinvXXv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXandXXinvXXv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXselXXinvXXv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXtopXXinvXXv{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsInvertibleTyping}{
\ottdefntyXXvarXXinv{}\ottdefntyXXvalXXinv{}}

% defns OperationalSemantics
%% defn red
\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXsel}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \nu \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}  \ottnt{defs}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{\}}  \in  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{defs}}%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_sel}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \lambda  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{t}}%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x} \, \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXletXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{val} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{val}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_let\_val}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXletXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottmv{y} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_let\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXletXXtgt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_let\_tgt}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXsel{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXletXXval{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXletXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXletXXtgt{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsOperationalSemantics}{
\ottdefnred{}}

\ottdefnsInvertibleTyping
\ottdefnsOperationalSemantics
}
